resources.string: In order to prevent malicious third party applications from accessing and using your verification codes, the EMUI system has placed your verification code under protection.
The network server is busy. Please try later.
Multimedia messages cannot be encrypted. Attachments will be sent without encryption.
An encrypted message cannot be saved as a draft. If you want to go back, your message will be discarded.
An encrypted message cannot be saved as a draft.
Failed to enable the encrypted messaging function.
Encrypted messaging function enabled on SIM 1.
Encrypted messaging function enabled on SIM 2.
Failed to enable the encrypted messaging function on SIM 1.
Failed to enable the encrypted messaging function on SIM 2.
Failed to associate to your fingerprint ID.
Failed to disable the encrypted messaging function.
Encrypted messaging function disabled on SIM 1.
Encrypted messaging function disabled on SIM 2.
Failed to disable the encrypted messaging function on SIM 1.
Failed to disable the encrypted messaging function on SIM 2.
Failed to activate, check your network settings
This SIM card has been associated with %s. Please disassociate from that account first.
The encrypted messaging function has been enabled. Your identity will be verified when viewing encrypted messages. Associate to your fingerprint ID to quickly open those messages?
The service credential of the encrypted messages feature has expired. Please re-enable this feature.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
%1$s relies on Google Play services, which is not supported by your device. Contact the manufacturer for assistance.
%1$s requires one or more Google Play services that are not currently available. Please contact the developer for assistance.
Error signing in to the specified account. Please choose a different account.
Accessing accounts from a restricted profile is not supported.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. If the problem persists, please contact the developer for assistance.
DRM protected files can\'t be attached.
Unable to send this message.\nAttempt made: %s.
Can\'t compose. Not default SMS app.
The message is too big to attach a video.
You can\'t add this %1$s to your message.
This picture is too large to send, even when resized.
Your message will be discarded because it has no valid recipients.
Couldn\'t send due to network problem.
Your message has no valid recipients.
%1$sThere is a limit of attachments. Only the first will be added.%2$s
Duration must be greater than zero seconds.
Preview messages in the notification panel
Touch to make Messaging your default SMS app
Touch to change your default SMS app
Request a delivery report for each message that you send
Request a read report for each message that you send
Request a delivery report for each message that you send
Delete old messages as limits are reached
Use MMS to send a single message when there are multiple recipients
Delete some messages to make room for more.
An incoming message was rejected due to full memory. Delete some old messages.
An incoming message was rejected due to an unknown reason.
A read report will be sent.
Unable to send messages right now. The message will be sent when the service recovers.
You can only send messages to your fixed dialling numbers.
A large number of multimedia messages are being sent. Is this OK?
Failed to send message. You need to add your SMS centre number to your Fixed Dialling Number list first.
Touch to review the message and try again.
Touch to view the message and send again
Touch to view the message and download again
Can\'t download right now. Try again later.
No APN specified on the device.
Limit the number of messages that you save per conversation?
Can\'t send message at the moment. There are too many unsent multimedia messages.
The state of threads and recipients is inconsistent. Please capture a bug report and report it via http://go/droidanizer
Stop duplicate text message notifications from default Messaging app?
Failed to download. The request will be attempted again later.
Failed to send. The request will be attempted again later.
The common phrase will be deleted.
Can\'t delete. This is not the default SMS app.
Can\'t send. This is not the default SMS app.
The subject has reached the maximum length.
Sending the message in the background...
A draft to the same recipients already exists. This draft will be replaced with the current draft.
Sending the message in the background...
Some messages not copied to SIM.
Some messages not copied to UIM.
This app isn\'t allowed to perform this action by the device owner.
Please contact the owner for permission to use this feature.
Send a delivery report for each message you receive
You won\'t receive new SMS/MMS messages
Sends out all MMSs from the outbox to the network
Failed to copy message to SIM card 1.
Failed to copy message to SIM card 2.
Failed to copy message to CDMA card.

Invalid file format. Failed to share the file.
Setting an incorrect number may prevent the sending of text messages. For the SMS centre number, contact your service provider.

The existing content will be replaced.
Show the sender when forwarding a message
You will no longer receive phone calls and messages from this contact. Add to blacklist anyway?
You will no longer receive messages from this contact. Add to blacklist?
You can only add up to %1$s recipients.
Cannot forward multimedia messages in multi-selection mode.

All failed messages will be deleted.
All failed messages have been deleted.

This number must range from %1$d to %2$d.
Can\'t edit conversations. Not default SMS app.
Failed to copy message to SIM card %s.
Messaging is not your default SMS app. Set it as your default app?
This function is not available in ultra power saving mode.
An email address exists in your list of recipients. Send this message to all recipients via MMS?
Cannot add slides if vCards exist. Please delete the vCards first.
Cannot add slides if vCalendars exist. Please delete the vCalendars first.
Drag down to enable Thumb mode
All unread messages will be marked as read.
Mark all unread messages as read?
Enabling Retrieve automatically when roaming may incur roaming fees. Enable anyway?
Messages needs to enable data roaming to download multimedia messages. Enable?
Failed to add this number to the blacklist.
Show info messages in a single list view
Info messages older than 30 days will be automatically deleted after you enable this function. Some important info messages may be deleted.
Info messages earlier than %d days will be deleted after you enable this feature, including those that may be important. Enable?
If enabled, info messages older than %d days will be deleted, including those that may be important. Enable?
Info messages from numbers starting with 106, 400, etc.
Info messages from banks, brokerage firms, insurance companies, etc.
Info messages from China Mobile, China Unicom and China Telecom
To withdraw a message, double-touch the message box immediately after it\'s been sent (within 4 seconds).
This message is already in favourites.
Attachment saved to %s. Please keep it secure.
Deleted messages will be temporarily placed in the recycle bin for 15 days before being permanently erased
All messages in the recycle bin will be permanently erased. Disable it?

Deleted messages will be temporarily placed in the recycle bin for 15 days before being permanently erased. This gives you a grace period to recover messages that you may have unintentionally deleted. You can restore the messages by going to Menu > SMS recycle bin.
To cancel sending a message, double touch the message bubble within 4 seconds
Failed to send message. Resend it?
Edited SMS message copied to clipboard.

Enable this feature to have your phone intelligently identify the content of your messages and reorganise them into easy-to-read cards. You will find it easier to perform routine tasks such as recharging accounts, paying bills, replying to messages, and receiving reminders.
Allows for a full and accurate localization experience
To provide richer and more accurate localization services, smart SMS requires access to your device IMSI and sender number to determine the origin of incoming messages.
You can also enable enhanced SMS services from message settings.
An SMS message must be sent in order to perform query services. Standard messaging rates apply. Allow?
New message templates are available. Enable Auto-update templates to receive the latest message templates and services as soon as theyre available.
Search online and provide a full and accurate localisation experience

To provide richer and more accurate localisation services, smart SMS requires access to the Internet to search for updates as well as access your device IMSI and sender number to determine the origin of incoming messages. Allow?
Location services must be enabled before you can use this feature.
Request a delivery report for each message you send
Auto-delete info messages over 30 days old
Show info messages in a single list view
Info messages from numbers starting with 106, 400, etc.
Deleted messages will be temporarily placed in the recycle bin for 15 days before being permanently erased
To cancel sending a message, double touch the message bubble within 4 seconds
To cancel sending a message, double-touch the message bubble within %d seconds
The system messaging app is not your default messaging app.
A maximum of 10 messages can be copied at a time.

To enable encrypted messaging, your phone\'s IMEI will be sent to the server via SMS (standard messaging rates apply). This information will be stored safely and will not be used for purposes other than the encrypted messaging feature.

To enable encrypted messaging, you will need to use your Huawei ID. Your identification will be verified when you view encrypted messages. The encrypted messaging feature can only be used by users of Huawei phones when both phones have this feature enabled.
This message is too long to be encrypted. To encrypt this message, delete some text.
This feature is currently limited to SIM cards from carriers in Mainland China only (excluding Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan).
This is not the SIM card you used to receive this message. To view the message, change SIM cards.
Enable encrypted messaging to view this message.
Insert a SIM card and enable encrypted messaging.

Encrypted messages requires access to the Internet when you activate and use it. Data charges may apply. When you enable encrypted messages, your phones IMEI will be sent to the server via SMS; standard messaging rates apply. This information will be stored safely and will not be used for purposes other than the encrypted messages service.
Please download and install HiLives to access fast and convenient top up and payment services.
An SMS message must be sent to use query services. Standard messaging rates apply. Allow?
Smart SMS enhanced services require access to the following permissions to provide more accurate service menu and number identification services:
• Device IMSI\n• Info message numbers\n• Internet access to search for phone number attributes and updates
You have entered too many characters.
Malicious website identification service provided by Tencent; results are for reference purposes only. Other services provided by bizport.cn
Hyperlink may be risky, proceed with caution
This website has been identified as a malicious site, opening it is extremely risky. Proceed with caution.
This website has been identified as a malicious site. Proceed with caution as opening it bears a high level of risk.
This service is provided by a third party supplier, Avast.
This website has not been verified. Proceed with caution as opening it can bear some level of risk.
Smart SMS enhanced services require access to the following permissions to provide a more accurate service menu, number identification and malicious website identification services:

• Device IMSI and IMEI
• Info message number
• Internet access to search for phone number attributes, malicious website addresses and updates
• Update message templates automatically over Wi-Fi

• Device IMSI and IMEI
• Info message number
• Internet access to search for phone number attributes, malicious website addresses and updates
• Update message templates automatically over WLAN

Messaging requires access to the following permissions to provide smart SMS enhanced services and website identification, including a more accurate service menu, card identification, and malicious/fraudulent website identification services:
• Info message number and websites\n• Internet access to search for phone number attributes, malicious website addresses, and updates\n• Update message templates automatically over Wi-Fi
• Info message number and websites\n• Internet access to search for phone number attributes, malicious website addresses, and updates\n• Update message templates automatically over WLAN

Malicious website identification services are provided by a third party supplier, Tencent. Results are for your reference only. Smart messaging services are provided by a third party supplier, bizport.cn.
Search online and provide a more accurate service menu, card identification and malicious website identification services
Do not allow third party apps to access and use your verification codes
The message you have entered will be saved as a draft.
Use RCS to hold group chats, place video calls and send/receive files

The message will be stored on the server. The recipient will receive it the next time he or she logs in.
No applications available to play this file.
Always compress a photo or video before sending it
Show a file size warning dialogue box even when Always compress is enabled
Insufficient storage space. Please delete some files to free up some space.
Auto-accept files over Wi-Fi and mobile data connections, except when roaming
Auto-accept files over WLAN and mobile data connections, except when roaming
Auto-accept files over Wi-Fi and mobile data connections, including when roaming
Auto-accept files over WLAN and mobile data connections, including when roaming
You will not receive messages from this group after you exit it.
The recipient is offline. The file will be sent when the recipient is online.
Insufficient storage. Please delete some files.

Request a delivery report for each group chat message you send
Failed to send the file. The file does not exist.
Failed to send the file. You are not logged into RCS.
The recipient is offline. The message will be sent when the recipient is online.
Cannot send your message. Check your login status or whether you\'re in this group.
Compressing the video... Do not exit.
Video compression not ready. Please try again later.
Only one video can be compressed at a time.
The video resolution is lower than %dp. It does not need to be compressed.
Videos in this format cannot be compressed.
Failed to send this IM. Send it via SMS?
You have invited %s to join this group.
The size of this media file is over the warning threshold.
The file size cannot be %d bytes.

Touch here to send an IM, SMS or MMS
Touch here to start a group chat
Touch here to switch between IM and SMS/MMS modes
Touch here to attach photos, videos, recordings and more
Touch here to view group details
Set the nickname displayed to other non-contacts in group chats
Your nickname cannot be left empty.
Chat message not yet delivered. It will be delivered once the recipient reconnects. Do you want to send a copy by SMS?
Chat message not yet delivered. It will be delivered once the recipient reconnects. Do you want to send a copy by MMS?
Cannot forward multimedia messages in multi-selection mode.

To enable the encrypted messaging function, you will need to use your Huawei ID. Your identification will be verified when you view encrypted messages. The encrypted messaging function can only be used by users of Huawei phones when both phones have this function enabled.

To enable encrypted messaging, your phone\'s IMEI will be sent to the server via SMS. This information will be stored safely and will not be used for purposes other than encrypted messaging.\n\nFor details about potential SMS fees, contact your carrier.
When you send a contact file via IM, the contact file will be exported to your phone. Please keep the contact file safe because it contains your personal data.
The video resolution is higher than %1$s and its size exceeds the warning threshold of %2$s. It is recommended that you compress it before sending.
The video resolution is higher than %1$s. It is recommended that you compress it before sending.
This is not the SIM card you used to receive this message. To view the message, change to the correct SIM card.
This message is too long to be encrypted. To encrypt this message, delete some text.
To view this message, enable the encrypted messages feature.
To view this encrypted message, insert your SIM card and enable the encrypted messages feature.
You are about to send your message to a 7-digit number. If this is a phone number, you need to use the full 10-digit number, including the area code. Do you want to add an area code?
Reached the maximum number of characters.
After you enable this function, your phone will automatically receive files when it is on a Wi-Fi network or non-roaming mobile network. Continue?
After you enable this function, your phone will automatically receive files when it is on a WLAN network or non-roaming mobile network. Continue?
You can also enable or disable this function from message settings.
Enabling this function may incur data roaming charges. Continue?
Display a notification when the file size exceeds the warning threshold
Failed to obtain location information. Please try again later.
The MMS subject will be lost. Continue?
The video size exceeds the upper limit of 10 MB. Compress it before sending?
You can improve location accuracy by turning on: \n ·High accuracy mode \n ·Wi-Fi
You can improve location accuracy by turning on: \n ·High accuracy mode \n ·WLAN
Failed to create the group. Make sure you have a working Internet connection.
You have entered too many characters.

Encrypted messages requires access to the Internet when you activate and use it. Data charges may apply. At the same time, to enable encrypted messages, your phones IMEI will be sent to the server via SMS, and standard messaging rates apply.\nThe server will not gain access to the content of the SMS message. The uploaded information will be stored safely and will not be used for purposes other than the encrypted messages service.
This is not the account you used to enter the group, can\'t send messages
This is the account you used to enter the group, you can send messages now
Recently used emojis will appear here
Unable to find file. Please select a file from your local device.
Identify malicious or unverified websites (Internet access required)
Malicious website identification requires access to the web address in the message and the Internet. Allow access?
This service is provided by a third party supplier, Avast.
SMS centre number is empty. Ensure that you have a valid SMS centre number before trying again.
SMS service is disabled. Please consult your carrier for details before trying again.
Download and send MMS messages even when mobile data is off
Download and send MMS messages even when mobile data is off
Automatically back up your messages to HiCloud to prevent accidental deletion and allow easy access from any device. Enable now?
EMUI has prevented malicious third party apps from accessing and using your verification code. Do not share.
Please allow Messaging to access your device\'s camera.
Please allow Messaging to access your device\'s microphone.

Can\'t record a video while you\'re in a call.

Enable HiCloud backup to view and recover your messages on another Huawei device.
The malicious website identification service needs to obtain website URLs in messages and access the Internet for online identification. Enable?
Malicious website identification service powered by Avast. Results are for reference only.

The smart SMS enhanced services and website identification service can provide a more accurate service menu, card identification, and malicious/fraudulent website identification services. This feature requires:
• Info message number and website information.\n• Internet access to search for phone number attributes, malicious website addresses, and updates.
Smart SMS services are provided by bizport.cn. Malicious website identification services are provided by Tencent. Results are for your reference only.
Update message templates automatically over Wi-Fi
Update message templates automatically over WLAN
Please enable smart SMS enhanced services and website identification
Access the Internet for online malicious website identification. This service is powered by Avast. Results are for reference only.
Internet access is required to search for phone number attributes, web addresses, updates, and more.
No network connection, touch to retry
Loading timed out, touch to retry
Please allow Messaging access to the Location permission for this device.
Get the latest information immediately by group chat with the best multi-chat experience.
Easily send pictures, documents, and other media. Enjoy a more powerful way of communicating.
Use voice chat to share information immediately and conveniently.
Using Message+ you can enjoy many great features, such as sending media and creating group chats. Using Call+ you can send friends subjects, sketches, and other information while calling them.
Enjoy more powerful means of communication by sending photos, files, and locations. Bring your calls and messages to life with the RCS service.

No cellular network available. Connect to WLAN for messaging.
